services.name: Classic Skin Fade
services.description: Clean and sharp low or mid skin fade with a tailored top. Perfect for a fresh, modern look that still feels professional.

services.name: Beard Trim & Shaping
services.description: Detailed beard trim with razor line-up and shaping to match your face structure. Finished with warm towel and beard oil.

services.name: Full Haircut & Style
services.description: From classic gentleman cuts to trendy textured crops, finished with professional styling products so you walk out photo-ready.

services.name: Fade With Beard Combo
services.description: A full fade plus beard trim and line-up. Balanced proportions between hair and beard for a strong, masculine look.

services.name: Clean Up & Neckline
services.description: Quick refresh between full cuts. Neckline, edges and sideburns cleaned up so you stay sharp all week.
